s852: Eleventh year: The crown prince was born.
s1096: Ninth year: Fought with Qin at Shao Liang; they captured our crown prince.
s1196: Eighth year: Shen Bu Hai served as chancellor.
s1290: Second year: Defeated Wei at Ma Ling. Tian Ji, Tian Ying, and Tian Chou commanded; Sun Zi was the strategist.
s1455: Third year: Zhang Yi was dismissed as chancellor and became chancellor of Wei.
s1521: Eleventh year: Qin defeated our general Ying.
s1539: Thirteenth year: Qin captured our Lin and took general Zhao Zhuang prisoner.
s1540: Sixteenth year: Zhang Yi came to serve as chancellor.
s1549: Seventeenth year: Qin defeated our general Qu Dun.
s1572: Second year: First established the position of chancellor; Chu Li Zi and Gan Mao became chancellors.
s1591: Twelfth year: The crown prince went to court Qin.
s1630: Twenty-sixth year: The crown prince was hostage in Qin.
s1647: Twenty-fifth year: Zhao attacked Zhongshan. Hui Hou died.
s1648: Twenty-eighth year: Qin, Han, Wei, and Qi defeated our general Tang Mei at Chong Qiu.
s1653: Seventh year: Chu Li Ji died. Attacked Chu and beheaded 30,000. Wei Ran became chancellor.
s1718: Third year: Qin defeated us at Yi Que, beheaded 240,000, and captured general Xi.
s1725: Fifteenth year: Wei Ran was dismissed as chancellor.
s1824: Twenty-sixth year: Wei Ran again became chancellor.
s1845: Twentieth year: Met with Qin at Meng Chi; Lin Xiang Ru accompanied.
s1896: Thirty-fourth year: Bai Qi attacked Wei's Hua Yang army; Mang Mao fled; got the three Jin generals and beheaded 150,000.
s1917: Twenty-eighth year: Lin Xiang Ru attacked Qi and reached Ping Yi.
s1926: Twenty-ninth year: Qin attacked Han's Yan Yu. Zhao She commanded and attacked Qin, greatly defeating them; granted the title Ma Fu.
s1950: Fortieth year: The crown prince who was hostage in Wei died and was returned for burial at Zhi Yang.
s2016: Sixth year: Sent Zhao Kuo to replace Lian Po as commander. Bai Qi defeated Kuo's 450,000.
s2169: Second year: The crown prince returned from being hostage in Qin.
s2270: Twenty-third year: Crown Prince Dan, who was hostage in Qin, fled and returned.
